tool_description: This API provides data on alcohol consumption by country. With this API, users can access valuable insights into global alcohol consumption patterns, enabling them to make data-driven decisions in a variety of fields, including healthcare, public policy, and marketing.
title: Alcohol Consumption By Country

api_list.name: Get Alcohol Consumption of all Countries
api_list.description: Get Alcohol Consumption of all Countries
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://alcohol-consumption-by-country.p.rapidapi.com/backend/alcohol-consumption-by-country/data/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "alcohol-consumption-by-country.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
